description:
With his scientifically-advanced armor, Valon systematically dismantles Jonouchi’s every move!  However, Jonouchi is ready to strike back with his own modern armory as he combines Claw of Hermos with Rocket Warrior to form a never-before-seen cannon with incredibly devastating capabilities!  As Jonouchi fires the final obliterating blast, victory is in his grasp... or is there more to Valon’s techno tactics than meets the eye?
Source: crunchyroll
